amendment.description: To modify and limit certain exemptions to the Freedom of Information Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2142 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2142 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S3545-3547) To modify and limit certain exemptions to the Freedom of Information Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2142 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2142 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
